question: Which country is to impose "Latte-Levy" to Reduce Single-Use Plastic Cups by 2021?
explanation: Ireland will impose a so-called \"latte levy\" on disposable coffee cups by 2021 in a bid to change consumer habits and cut the environmental impact from the use of single-use plastics. The proposed levy of up to 0.25 euros per cup will encourage coffee drinkers to instead carry around reusable \"Keep Cups\" that already allow customers to claim a discount in some coffee shops.
